ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Bank Head of Compliance  Manchester, UK  2014 - Present  Overseeing the compliance department, responsible for the development and implementation of compliance strategies. Leading a team of compliance professionals, ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements and internal policies. Key Achievements :   Implemented a comprehensive compliance management system, reducing compliance breaches by 25%.  Developed and conducted training programs, enhancing compliance awareness across the organization.  Successfully managed multiple high-profile regulatory investigations, mitigating potential risks.  Lloyds Banking Group Senior Compliance Manager  Manchester, UK  2009 - 2014  Managed compliance functions across multiple departments, ensuring regulatory compliance and developing risk mitigation strategies. Conducted audits, risk assessments, and provided guidance on compliance issues.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted detailed compliance audits and risk assessments.  Developed and updated compliance policies and procedures.  Collaborated with senior management to integrate compliance into business strategies.  Investigated and resolved compliance issues and breaches.  Barclays Bank Compliance Officer  Manchester, UK  2002 - 2009  Supported the compliance team in monitoring and enforcing compliance with regulatory requirements. Conducted due diligence, reviewed transactions, and assisted in the development of compliance programs.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on high-risk clients and transactions.  Assisted in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures.  Provided training and support to staff on compliance-related matters.

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Overseeing the compliance department, responsible for the development and implementation of compliance strategies. Leading a team of compliance professionals, ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements and internal policies. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Implemented a comprehensive compliance management system, reducing compliance breaches by 25%. 
 Developed and conducted training programs, enhancing compliance awareness across the organization. 
 Successfully managed multiple high-profile regulatory investigations, mitigating potential risks.

JobProfile.Title: Senior Compliance Manager
JobProfile.Alias: senior level compliance manager, compliance sr. manager, sr compliance manager, sr. compliance manager, compliance senior manager, senior manager of compliance, senior compliance team mgr, senior compliance supervisor, senior compliance mgr, senior compliance head, senior compliance mngr, senior compliance team manager, senior manager compliance, senior-compliance- manager, snr compliance manager

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Managed compliance functions across multiple departments, ensuring regulatory compliance and developing risk mitigation strategies. Conducted audits, risk assessments, and provided guidance on compliance issues. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted detailed compliance audits and risk assessments. 
 Developed and updated compliance policies and procedures. 
 Collaborated with senior management to integrate compliance into business strategies. 
 Investigated and resolved compliance issues and breaches.

JobProfile.Title: Compliance Officer
JobProfile.Alias: agent compliance reviewer, regulatory compliance inspector, compliance and protection officer, compliance and control rep, branch safety and compliance inspector, officer of compliance, compliance services officer, compliance rep, regional compliance officer, officer compliance, compliance representative, bilingual compliance officer, compliance staff, compliance oversight officer, compliance and inspection officer, operations compliance officer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the compliance team in monitoring and enforcing compliance with regulatory requirements. Conducted due diligence, reviewed transactions, and assisted in the development of compliance programs. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on high-risk clients and transactions. 
 Assisted in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures. 
 Provided training and support to staff on compliance-related matters.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly experienced Head of Compliance with 18 years in the banking industry. Expertise in regulatory compliance, risk management, and the development and implementation of comprehensive compliance programs. Adept at leading teams, managing high-stakes compliance issues, and ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements. Recognized for strong analytical skills, strategic thinking, and a commitment to fostering a culture of compliance.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Olivia has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Compliance Officers. and has been currently working for HSBC Bank Head of Compliance for the last 10.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Olivia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Senior Compliance Manager at Lloyds Banking Group. from 01/01/2009 to 31/12/2014. The candidate has a total experience of 6.0 years in this company.
